title: Why a 'nasty' 10% to 15% sell-off in the stock market may be a few months away
full_text: Why a 'nasty' 10% to 15% sell-off in the stock market may be a few months away. Expect the unexpected in the stock market.. Veteran trader and Thinkorswim founder Tom Sosnoff is a contrarian by nature. And where markets are currently trading has set off a few internal alarm bells. "It's not that I think we're rolling ov… [+4983 chars]
